item.title: Blog: Minecraft Trolling Days
item.description: In this blog I'll summarize the trolling days of me on Minecraft Bedrock.

item.title: Blog: PC Simulator 'magic carpet' trick
item.description: In this blog I ramble about a YouTuber who made 'gaming plushie' content.

item.title: Blog: PlushTuber Apocalypse: AnimeBroMii
item.description: In this blog I ramble about a YouTuber who made 'gaming plushie' content.

item.title: Mastodon
item.description: The website will now be verified on my Mastodon profile, and I added a neat attribution tag to my blogs in case of the rare moment anyone links it.

item.title: New guide page
item.description: I have been meaning to do this and now that I have a 3DS it is here! My guide for getting ROMs on things other than the Wii.

item.title: Tiny things
item.description: I have been quietly adding more buttons along with a cool (heh) new div at the home page for the holidays. With this comes a new robots.txt file, check it out, but don't check it out for too long!

item.title: Cosmetic Overhaul
item.description: Well that's a way to say makeover. The website now has more rounded boxes, a new place for 88x31 buttons, a hidden game, and setting up the foundation for comments on this website.

item.title: New Gallery!
item.description: I am starting a gallery page, it includes 4:3 photos I have taken on my main phone.

item.title: Blog: Dogeminer: Need More Coins!
item.description: I play a childhood mobile game Dogeminer.

item.title: New Wii ROMs guide
item.description: I have now ported my old Wii ROMs guides that was on Google Docs.

item.title: New 404 page
item.description: Finally got around to this, the website now has a custom 404 page and not the GitHub one.

item.title: Hello RSS!
item.description: I am now trying out RSS on this website, as such, the 'What's New' log has been moved to Extras.

item.title: Blog: Discord Shenanigans
item.description: In this blog I talk about my first time on Discord, a group I joined, and an attempt to find them again.
